name: Rock Steady Crew
description:
'''Rock Steady Crew''' is an American [[breakdance|breaking]] and [[hip hop]] group which has become a franchise for multiple groups in other locations. The group's 1983 international hit song "[[(Hey You) The Rock Steady Crew]]" (from the group's first studio album ''[[Ready for Battle]]'') peaked at No. 6 on the [[UK Singles Chart]], and reached the top 10 in many European countries. Members of Rock Steady Crew featured in the films ''[[Flashdance]]'' and 
''[[Beat Street]]'', which ignited international interest in the [[Breakdancing|b-boy]] subculture.
